channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CloudBees Docker Hub/Registry Notification Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CloudBees Docker Hub/Registry Notification Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-45385|2024-08-03T14:09:57.000Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cloudbees%20docker%20hub%2Fregistry%20notification%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins CloudBees Docker Hub/Registry Notification Plugin 2.6.2 and earlier allows unauthenticated attackers to trigger builds of jobs corresponding to the attacker-specified repository.
